reviews.review: Independently, Avengers: Infinity War is exciting, well-acted, often hilarious, and beautiful to look at. Within the context of the MCU, it's a masterpiece! No superhero movie, and few action movies in general, step outside of storytelling convention in such a daring way. The depth of the characters and plot trickle down to the rest of the MCU films, as foreshadowing and a central theme begin to appear in everything from the original Iron Man onward. Also, Thanos is f*cking terrifying and raises high stakes in the movie, which is something I never expect from stories revolving around action figures.

This is the culmination of ten years of the MCU and the genius that went into it. Itâ€™s like the six Star Wars films wrapped into one. One cares about all of the characters, even the evil ones, which are all well-respected and well fleshed out. This is how franchises are supposed to be.
I dont know how is possible that Thanos feel very sadly
The movie was great! Made me cry and laugh a lot. It's a 10 year lead up to this film so it's a bit emotional when great characters died

Loved it. They pulled it off and created a film that was a feast for the senses. I can't wait for the second installment. You have to know your character's before you go to the movie. Otherwise a lot of things won't make sense.  Marvel Studios did an amazing job of stitching all the stories together in a coherent 2.5 hour movie.

Met almost all of my expectations. a very ambitious movie that could have easily spanned across three movies. it packs a lot into a neat two and a half hour package, and although I wish certain characters got more screentime, the movie left me feeling many different emotions.

The only way you don't love this movie is if you don't like superheroes. 
Marvel does it better than ANYBODY!
AWesome! This movie is great!!  not like star wars the last Jedi at all, that movie was terrible.
